description: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
lore: The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...
note:
Affected units are leashed, and prevented from blinking.
Provides vision of both leashed units.
aghanim: Grants you a new ability, Dark Portrait. Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero.

name: mars_gods_rebuke
description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.
lore: There isn't a warrior alive who can stand unmoved by the sting of Mars' rebuke.
note: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on God's Rebuke attacks.
aghanim: Decreases cooldown of God's Rebuke during Arena of Blood. Resets God's Rebuke cooldown when Arena of Blood is cast.

name: special_bonus_unique_visage_3
description: A second Soul Assumption is launched towards a random enemy unit within the cast range, prioritizing Heroes.

name: special_bonus_unique_wraith_king_4
description: Instead of being slowed, all enemy units within 900 range have the current level of Wraithfire Blast cast on them when Reincarnation triggers.

name: mars_bulwark
description:
Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

 Can be toggled, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs **70%** of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.
lore: Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war.

name: mars_spear
description: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.
lore: The legendary Spear of Mars still glows with the heat of the forge god's fires.
note:
Spear of Mars can hit invisible units and reveals them if they are stunned.
Spear of Mars will only pin a units to cliffs onto elevated areas, otherwise it will push them off onto lower ground.

name: mars_arena_of_blood
description: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.
lore: The long-dead members of the Ash Legion, assembled from the finest warriors to ever test the might of Mars, still revel in the thrill of combat, gladly beholden to the hand that fell them for as long as he so commands.

name: special_bonus_unique_clinkz_3
description: When using Searing Arrows, a second Searing Arrow targets a random enemy within the spell's range.

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_4
description: Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a **90** second cooldown. Creates **2** visible Sun Strikes within **160**-**200** range of each enemy hero.

name: special_bonus_unique_kunkka_3
description: Spawns 3 Ghostships, **2.8** seconds apart, towards the target location.

name: special_bonus_unique_morphling_3
description: Additional enemy units within cast range are also targeted by Adaptive Strike.

name: special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_2
localized_name: +110 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_mars_arena_of_blood_hp_regen
localized_name: Arena Of Blood Grants Team +100 HP Regen

name: special_bonus_unique_antimage_5
description: After blinking, an uncontrollable illusion is created at Anti-Mage's original location.  Deals **-75%** less damage, takes **250%** damage, and lasts **10** seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_medusa_4
description: Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot.

name: special_bonus_unique_death_prophet_4
description: While Exorcism is active, Death Prophet moves at 550 movement speed and cannot be slowed.

name: special_bonus_unique_wisp_4
description: While tethered to a friendly Hero, each time that Hero attacks, Io will attack the same target automatically.

name: special_bonus_unique_axe_3
description: Your own attacks against enemy units also have a chance to trigger Counter Helix.

name: special_bonus_unique_bane_4
description: Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.

name: special_bonus_unique_morphling_4
description: Enemies hit by Waveform are also instantly attacked by Morphling.

name: special_bonus_unique_puck_3
description: Puck instantly attacks all enemies while affected by Dream Coil, every **0.7** seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_queen_of_pain_2
description: Enemies damaged by Scream of Pain are forced to run towards their fountain for **1.5** seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_razor_4
localized_name: +200 Eye of the Storm Passive Damage

name: special_bonus_unique_riki_5
description: No actions take Riki out of invisibility, only revealed by sources of True Sight.

name: special_bonus_unique_sand_king_4
description: Enemy units in range of Sand Storm have their movement speed slowed by **50%** and miss **50%** of their attacks.

name: special_bonus_unique_storm_spirit_4
localized_name: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
description: Every **500** distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.

name: special_bonus_unique_sven_3
description: Applies a basic dispel on all enemies hit.

name: special_bonus_unique_wisp_5
description: While tethered to a friendly Hero, that Hero gains its Aghanim's Scepter ability upgrades for the duration.

name: tiny_toss_tree
description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_4
description: Applies a basic dispel to Templar Assassin.

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_5
description: Enemies hit by the spill of Psi Blades have their movement speed slowed by **100%** for **1** second.

name: special_bonus_unique_treant_3
description: Any tree that is destroyed on the map will respawn **2** seconds later.

name: special_bonus_unique_troll_warlord_4
description: Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.

name: special_bonus_unique_tusk_4
description: Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.

name: special_bonus_unique_oracle_4
description: The target of False Promise also becomes invisible for the duration (with a 0.6 second fade time).

name: special_bonus_unique_venomancer_5
description: The wards are based on the current level of Plague Ward and spawned within 100 range of the impacted Hero, on opposite sides.

name: special_bonus_unique_winter_wyvern_4
description: The slow is still applied for the same duration.

name: special_bonus_unique_techies_4
description: All mines, including Stasis Traps, can be ordered to move to a location once placed.

name: morphling_adaptive_strike_str
description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a **3** second cooldown.
lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
note: Projectile moves at **1150** speed.

name: special_bonus_unique_faceless_void_4
description: Grants a **25%** chance to avoid damage entirely.

name: special_bonus_unique_tiny_5
description: Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.

name: special_bonus_unique_monkey_king_6
description: Creates an additional ring of **7** soldiers at **1100** range from the center.

name: special_bonus_unique_dark_seer_4
description: A second Wall of Replica is created **600** units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.

name: special_bonus_unique_shadow_demon_6
localized_name: Soul Catcher Creates Illusion On Death

name: special_bonus_unique_arc_warden_4
description: Affects visible units only.

name: visage_stone_form_self_cast
description: After a short delay, the nearest Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After **6** seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
note: While Stone Form is not dispellable, the stun can be removed by strong dispells.

name: special_bonus_unique_huskar_5
description: Pierces Spell Immunity.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar
description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk
description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

name: huskar_inner_fire
description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.

name: spirit_breaker_bulldoze
description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.

name: dazzle_bad_juju
description: Passively reduces cooldowns on your abilities and items. Anytime you cast a spell, all nearby enemies will have their armor reduced. Debuff stacks and refreshes duration.

name: chen_divine_favor
description:
Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and amplifies all health restore by a percentage.

Can be cast on allies to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.

name: pangolier_lucky_shot
description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to slow, apply a Disarm and reduce armor.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_defender
description: Spirit Bear absorbs **30%** of the damage dealt to Lone Druid.

name: lone_druid_spirit_link
description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.

name: brewmaster_cinder_brew
description: Drenches an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by **3** seconds when ignited.
lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

name: lich_dark_sorcery
description: Grants you bonus attack speed for a limited number of attacks, draining a percentage of mana for each hit. Costs a percentage of current health to cast. Lasts up to **15** seconds or when the attack count is consumed.

name: lich_frost_aura
description: Allied Aura. Causes all nearby ally attacks to slow enemy movement speed.

name: antimage_counterspell
description: Passively grants you magic resistance. Can be activated to create an anti-magic shell around you that sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead of affecting you.

name: keeper_of_the_light_will_o_wisp
description: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off every second. When active, it causes all enemies near it to stare hypnotized at it. Can be attacked by units in or outside of the radius, dies after a certain number of attacks.

name: meepo_ransack
description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.

name: clinkz_burning_army
description: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons use your current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Base damage is %base_damage_percent% of your hero's base damage. Attack range is equal to your hero's attack range.

name: rubick_arcane_supremacy
description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to deal more spell damage and create spells that last longer on enemies.
lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...

name: tusk_tag_team
description: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts **5** seconds.
note: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.

name: omniknight_pacify
description: Causes affected enemies to deal less spell damage for a duration.
lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.

name: lich_sinister_gaze
description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.
lore: Mind the cold...
aghanim: Casts Sinister Gaze in a target area.

name: void_spirit_aether_remnant
description: Vector targeted. Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
lore: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.

name: void_spirit_astral_step
description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for **1.25** seconds and then detonates.
lore: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.
note: Astral Step attacks do not cleave.

name: void_spirit_resonant_pulse
description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.
lore: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.

name: special_bonus_unique_void_spirit_8
description: Attacks made with Astral Step deal a critical strike.

name: seasonal_throw_snowball
description: Throw a snowball at an ally or enemy.
lore: Hand crafted at the perfect temperature.

name: seasonal_summon_snowman
description: Construct a jolly snowman.
lore: He'll stay friends as long as he can.

name: seasonal_decorate_tree
description: Give any tree a delightfully seasonal touch.
lore: Festive trappings for even the bloodiest of battlefields.

name: seasonal_festive_firework
description: Shoot a firework into the air.
lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

name: frostivus2018_throw_snowball
description:
Throw a snowball at an enemy, damaging and stunning all enemy units around it.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: Enjoy a bold, rocky center with a packed-ice crust!

name: frostivus2018_summon_snowman
description:
Summons a snowman that taunts nearby enemies.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: He's irresistibly friendly!

name: frostivus2018_decorate_tree
description:
Decorate a tree with blinking lights that damage nearby enemies.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: Who knew a few twinkling lights could be so deadly?

name: seasonal_summon_penguin
description: Summon a friendly penguin who slides around. Each time a hero bumps the penguin, it gains speed and lasts a bit longer.
lore: Nothing gets age-old enemies to set aside their differences quite like a penguin to play with.
note: Your team's penguins will pass through enemy heroes that you don't have vision of.

name: frostivus2018_festive_firework
description:
Fires a global range firework that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies, blinding them, and providing vision for 10 seconds.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

name: seasonal_summon_ti9_balloon
description: No one can resist the sky snake's goofy charms.

name: seasonal_ti9_banner
description: Plant your personal battle standard to mark this battleground as yours!

name: seasonal_ti9_instruments
description: Lay down some savage beats.

name: seasonal_ti9_shovel
description: Dig around the map for buried treasure!

name: seasonal_ti9_monkey
description: He'll fling filth at your enemies so you don't have to.

name: tiny_tree_channel
description: Tiny throws random trees within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

name: spectre_haunt_single
description: Allows you to perform a single target unit Haunt.

name: templar_assassin_trap_teleport
description: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after a brief channel. Does not break meld. Detonates the Psionic Trap on arrival.

name: arc_warden_scepter
description: Creates a random rune in front of you.

name: high_five
description: Throw your hand (or handy appendage) in the air!

name: grimstroke_dark_artistry
description: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
lore: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.

name: grimstroke_ink_creature
description:
Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.

Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
lore: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
note:
The phantom falls off if the target becomes invisible or spell immune.
The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.

name: grimstroke_spirit_walk
description: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After **3** seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
lore: Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.

name: necronomicon_archer_purge
description:
Removes positive buffs from enemies and slow their movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: dark_willow_terrorize
description: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.
lore: You think you know the first thing about fear? Jex'll show you what that word truly means...
note: Terrorize provides vision on affected units.

name: roshan_halloween_wave_of_force
description: After a delay, Roshan smashes the ground, causing massive radial damage in an area around him, knocking back all enemies.  The closer to Roshan the enemy is, the more damage it takes.

name: roshan_halloween_toss
description: Roshan tosses a nearby enemy unit at an enemy that is further away.

name: roshan_halloween_shell
description: Roshan becomes immune to physical damage, but takes enhanced magical damage for a brief time.  When Roshan uses Shell, all ability and item cooldowns are refreshed.

name: roshan_halloween_apocalypse
description: Roshan launches devastating beams of incineration from the sky at all enemy heroes outside of 400 range, but within 1200 range.

name: roshan_halloween_burn
description: Roshan breathes a lethal arc of searing fire.

name: roshan_halloween_summon
description: Roshan calls a group of Roshlings to aid him.

name: roshan_halloween_fireball
description: Roshan launches a number of slow moving fireballs at all nearby enemies.
